agentUtterance.text: Sorry to know about that. Can you please provide me with more details about the issue?

userUtterance.text: The charging is very slow, and sometimes it doesn't charge at all.

agentUtterance.text: I understand. Let's try to troubleshoot the issue. Have you tried using a different charging cable or charger?

userUtterance.text: Yes, I have tried different chargers and cables, but the issue persists

agentUtterance.text: I see. Can you check the charging port for any dust or debris?

userUtterance.text: I have already cleaned it, but it didn't help

agentUtterance.text: It might be an issue with the charging port or the battery. I recommend visiting the nearest service center for further diagnosis

userUtterance.text: Okay, I will do that. Thanks!

playbookInput.precedingConversationSummary: User is facing technical issues with battery

playbookOutput.executionSummary: You're welcome. If you have any other questions, please feel free to reach out.
